tool_description: SQL AST parsers and compilers for Postgresql and Snowflake dialects. Powered by holistic.dev
name: api.parsers.dev
title: api.parsers.dev

api_list.name: /api/parse/postgresql/
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to get Abstract Syntax Tree represented in your SQL-queries. You can parse any supported syntax (DDL, DML, DCL, TCL, and another specific syntax).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-parsers-dev.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/parse/postgresql/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-parsers-dev.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/compile/postgresql/(+ast)
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to get a special object compiled based on your DDL or DML query. Because DML strictly depends on database schema (DDL), DML can be compiled to a special object, based on DDL only.
